references: Mohammad K. Azarian, Forty-Five Nested Equilateral Triangles and cosecant of 1 degree, Problem 813, College Mathematics Journal, Vol. 36, No. 5, November 2005, p. 413-414. Solution published in Vol. 37, No. 5, November 2006, pp. 394-395.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=tan(1); for (n=1, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b049471.txt", n, " ", d)); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 13 2009
crossrefs: Cf. A093178 Continued fraction. A009001. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 13 2009
author: Albert du Toit (dutwa(AT)intekom.co.za), _N. J. A. Sloane_
